item.title: Current 2024 Recap
item.description:
Note
 This post originally appeared on the Decodable blog.

Launched in 2022, the Current conference hosted by Confluent has established itself as one of the leading conferences in the data streaming space. Stemming from Kafka Summit originally, itâ€™s broadened to reflect Confluentâ€™s product portfolio including most notably Apache Flink.
